prompt:
Can you provide more information about the collaborative efforts between Spinlock and Volvo offshore sailors in the development of the Deckvest VITO lifejacket harness? Answer according to: Spinlock Deckvest VITO Offshore 170N Hammar Lifejacket – the Deckvest VITO is the latest Spinlock Inflatable lifejacket harness technology, based on the Spinlock Design work for the Volvo Ocean Race teams. All teams wew equipped with the same inflatable lifejacket harness developed in collaboration with a core group of Volvo offshore sailors. Fundamental to the new design was a lifejacket that crews actually want to wear more frequently with developed custom features.
Coarse and fine tune adjustment. Fit lifejacket to body size. Fine tune adjust each time for layers.
Added protection in high impact areas.
Lume-On bladder illumination lights fitted.
40mm leg strap with stowage.
result:
Can you provide more information about the collaborative efforts between Spinlock and Volvo offshore sailors in the development of the Deckvest VITO lifejacket harness? Answer according to: Spinlock Deckvest VITO Offshore 170N Hammar Lifejacket – the Deckvest VITO is the latest Spinlock Inflatable lifejacket harness technology, based on the Spinlock Design work for the Volvo Ocean Race teams. All teams wew equipped with the same inflatable lifejacket harness developed in collaboration with a core group of Volvo offshore sailors. Fundamental to the new design was a lifejacket that crews actually want to wear more frequently with developed custom features.
Coarse and fine tune adjustment. Fit lifejacket to body size. Fine tune adjust each time for layers.
Added protection in high impact areas.
Lume-On bladder illumination lights fitted.
40mm leg strap with stowage.The collaborative efforts between Spinlock and Volvo Ocean Race (VoR) sailors in the development of the Deckvest VITO were crucial in the creation of the state-of-the-art inflatable lifejacket harness. This collaboration was essential in ensuring the design and functionality aligned perfectly with the demands and safety requirements of high-performance ocean sailing. Here are some key aspects of this development process and its unique features, as described by the product's official website and promotional materials from the respective companies and racing teams during the development and testing of the product over the past two racing cycles of the Volvo Ocean Race in the years leading to the latest edition

This collaboration was essential in ensuring the design and functionality aligned perfectly with the demands and safety requirements of high-performance ocean sailing.
